author: sebb
msg: svnpubsub is the new current way

author: kkolinko
msg: Avoid using the same path for "tomcat-juli.jar" twice  when CATALINA_HOME and CATALINA_BASE are the same.

author: kkolinko
msg: Allow service.bat to be launched from a non-UAC console,
by using arguments instead of env variables to pass options to prunsrv.
+ Fix regression in r1567742 that values for --StdOutput, --StdError were lost.
+ Pass --LogPath option to service removal command, to avoid using default value for this option
